name: Zombie Town Survival
description:
Go on a headhunt and shoot the zombies and kill them to be the hero of the ultimate zombie assassin

Game Features:
* 2D Zombie shooting game.
* Kill different kinds of zombies.
* Powerful weapons ready for total elimination.
* Easy pick Up and Playing controls on the screen.
* Ravishing graphics with immersive quality sound.
* Furious game play
